paragraphs.body: In the Fire Nation, firework starters have two different designs, though both detonate in similar fashions; the first resembles red dynamite, and has a cone-shaped peak resting on a cylindrical body that contains explosive material, while the second is shaped like a sausage. The starters can be detonated either by fire or explosion and fly upward with rapid speed, leaving a trail of smoke behind them. As the fuse hits the explosive material, they explode loudly, sending out streaks of multi-colored light in every direction. The explosions themselves last just a few seconds, burning bright enough to light up the night sky and be seen during the day.
